fields.name: Find help on the official wiki!
fields.value:
All help for this bot can be found on the [Sporks Wiki on GitHub](https://github.com/brainboxdotcc/sporks/wiki). For further assistance, please join the [official brainbox.cc discord server](https://discord.gg/brainbox).
